# Changelog

## 0.1.0 - 2024-06-17
- First release.

## 0.1.1 - 2024-06-17
- Add missing repository URL to pyproject.toml.

## 0.2.0 - 2024-10-10
- Update `reed-solomon-simd` to 3.0.0. This allows for shard lengths that are not multiples of 64.

## 0.2.1 - 2024-11-25
- Update `reed-solomon-simd` to 3.0.1 for better AVX2 performance.
